Reviews.Author: Michelle Charles
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this purchase. I love the compact size and color and the pictures are great.

Reviews.Title: Sony
Reviews.Author: Bethany Bush
Reviews.Content: This product is good.  Takes good pictures.  Can zoom into pictures after being taken and save the oictire that way.

Reviews.Title: Clarity review of Sony Cybershot DSCW55
Reviews.Author: Stanley V. Patino
Reviews.Content: I bought this Sony product as it synchronises with my Sony Ericsson mobile phone. The memory card is compatible for both. The 7.2 MP was also very appealing. The convenience of having one common card played out positively with use. However, the clarity I was looking for did not materialise with the 7.2 MP claim. a previous Sony camera with a 4-5 MP specification was not bad compared with this one. It is possible that there is a plateau in the graph of clarity and MP until it rises again. The technical department of Sony can better explain this matter.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: L. M. Foster
Reviews.Content: This is my second Sony cybershot digital camera, although I have purchased Kodak Easy Shares for family members.  I loved the first one (only 3.2 MGP).  This camera is perfect for the not-so-tech-wise consumer.  It takes great pictures and has a high quality Zeiss lens.  Most of all it is easy to use, especialy for the beginner and intermediate user.  It stores easlily in a pocket and I love the color choices Sony gives you!  The review pictures button is a little small, but you get used to it quickly.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera and the pictures come out clear.
Reviews.Author: Vee fr Texas
Reviews.Content: I was very pleased with the Sony Cybershot DSCW55 7.2MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom in pink. Good investment!

Reviews.Title: Lol!
Reviews.Author: Jose R. M. Bertola "Renam Bertola"
Reviews.Content: Unbeliable camera !!!!!7.2 MEga pixel , it's fantastic !The battery takes long time to get over...

Reviews.Title: Buy the memory stick
Reviews.Author: Mark E. Bellot
Reviews.Content: It was a good gift for my wife.  It needs the memory stick to be useful.

Reviews.Title: Great pictures, almost toy-like though.
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: This camera takes great pictures and awesome macros. However it is very small and I feel like it's going to break whenever I use it. Very fragile.

Reviews.Title: Sony dscw55
Reviews.Author: Johuto
Reviews.Content: The product was shipped promptly and was correctly packaged. No problems. Very good camara for the price. I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good!
Reviews.Author: Puja
Reviews.Content: So far the camera has been amazing.  It takes really wonderful, clear pictures.  it does not come with a memory chip but has an internal card which is def nice.  I love that its pink so its a good conversation starter. The camera has pretty nice functions.  I am still learning but they seem to have every scenario covered.  The quality of the picture is good but takes some getting used to.  I have heard there is a blinding flash that people dont love but aside from that its pretty good.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for price
Reviews.Author: Thomas W. Ford
Reviews.Content: I have used this camera on several occasions since I purchased it. It is easy to use and the photos are great. I have a Fujifilm full-size digital which works well for some things, but I have found that this camera matches and exceeds the quality of the Fujifilm. If I had any regret it would be the slight lag time in the shutter when taking motion photos.

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: Nora Souki
Reviews.Content: Excelent camera, easy to managment, friendly and take excelent pictures. I am happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Great camera overall
Reviews.Author: David P. Burrows "Renaissance Man"
Reviews.Content: Great little camera for the price. Some of the controls are hard to use if you have big fingers. Arrows for inserting the memory card and battery properly are hard to see.We love it so far and have taken several hundred pictures that we are happy with. Only had it about a month now.

Reviews.Title: amazing photos
Reviews.Author: Gustavo Restrepo
Reviews.Content: I am so pleased with the resolution and the iso 1000 feature,I need a camera for night photos with the enough resolution.

Reviews.Title: review
Reviews.Author: Brian Watson "svin tokk"
Reviews.Content: Great camera, but with the output port being on the bottom, even with a tripod, you cannot view the picture about to be taken on a tv screen because it is impossible to plug it in.  So you have to view through the small screen to see the approximate area you want to take a picture using timer function and hope you got everything centered the way you want it.Really stupid place for the output port.  They should have at least moved the battery compartment closer to the middle and made the output port on the far side of the bottom of the camera so you could view the picture to be taken on a tv set before actually taking it.I really did not like this part of the camera.  All the basic functions seem to be ok, though.

Reviews.Title: Charge your battery, attach your memstick and start shooting!!
Reviews.Author: Renato Goncalves Cesar
Reviews.Content: You dont need to know anything about taking shots, using its automatic settings you get a VERY NICE picture...It have everything you want in a digital camera, the movie quality is also very nice!!I didnt think it would be so nice as it is...I recommend!!!

Reviews.Title: This camera is a little power house!
Reviews.Author: snow-hater
Reviews.Content: I have used all the other big names in the buisness, and this one is right up there with them. I have lots of other Soney products, so I decided to give this little camera a try.I trust Soney made a good choice bringing us this little beauty! Great, clear pictures,fair price, a definate "MUST HAVE". I recomend it Highly.

Reviews.Title: FLASH PROBLEM
Reviews.Author: ARNEL OF CERRITOS "ARNEL"
Reviews.Content: This is my second Cybershot.I have both the DSCW50 and DSCW55.The main problem of this particular model is the flash.Code 99 which is defective flash.Luckily on my first camera (DSCW50)the flash broke w/in the year of purchase,so it was fix free.But the second on (DSCW55)broke after 13 months.They were charging me $175.00 just to look at the camera.My older camera w/c is the Canon powershot A85 is still working.So I decided to switch back to Canon

Reviews.Title: Two Thumbs Up
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Dee Martinez
Reviews.Content: This camera is the easiest to use and also the prettiest pink camera around. It is easy to use and easy to upload the pics and the videos onto my computer.  This sale gets two thumbs up from me.

Reviews.Title: Highly recommended!
Reviews.Author: Roxme
Reviews.Content: After purchasing two of this camera's predecessors (DSCW50) as gifts, I found myself in the market once again when my scatter brain daughter lost hers on a trip to Italy.  However, this time she had to pay part of the cost in the vain hope that she'd be more responsible the second time around.  Anywho, these cameras have gotten high marks by all concerned for their ease of use, diminutive size, and excellent pictures.  I highly recommended these cameras for the pedestrian shutter bug.

Reviews.Title: cmguinness
Reviews.Author: Army Medic
Reviews.Content: I am extremely pleased with this camera. It is easy to use, has practical features, and is able to take video clips with sound for as long as you have memory on your card. The 7.2 megapixal lense takes top quality pictures!

Reviews.Title: Worth it.
Reviews.Author: S. Mohan "Satan"
Reviews.Content: I would say that this camera does everything that every other camera does and it is almost the same as any other point and shoot camera. I also have an Olympus Stylus 7.1 meg camera. This is just the same as that. I noticed little pauses with video recording mode. Maybe it was just due to memory stick as I was bought a cheaper quality memory card by my friend. Else, this camera is perfect. I had heard that it has a cheap plastic feel to it. But honestly, tell me who cares so much abt it. From a distance it looks and feels great. ANOTHER MINUS.. I wish this camera was weatherproof like my Olympus.

Reviews.Title: Great great camera!
Reviews.Author: kg
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this camera. It has taken beautiful pictures for me and has some really neat settings. I'm a technologically challenged college student, but this camera is so easy to use. I love using the black and white and sepia settings.Great deal for the price!!

Reviews.Title: Nice, inexpensive digital camera!
Reviews.Author: K. Hodges
Reviews.Content: This camera takes good pictures, zooms in pretty well. I do think it is worth the money. It does seem to be geared towards people who are relatively new to the digital camera world and or maybe someone who is not planning on taking millions and millions of pictures, maybe just on special occasions, or something to that effect. Overall I believe the camera is a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Great value for the price!
Reviews.Author: C. Burcky "80s fanatic"
Reviews.Content: I needed a digital camera that was easy to pick up and use, and this fit the bill! Just let me point out that I don't know about the specifics on digital cameras, but I do know that this can take pics pretty quick, has a pretty high megapixel count (7.2) and is a great value for the price! I highly recommend this camera to anyone who just need a camera to snap some quick pictures with.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: M. Pichardo
Reviews.Content: The Sony Cybershot is a great camera. The colors and the features are amazing. Is very easy to use. The only thing I dont like about the camera is the zoom in and out button. If you zoomed in you wont be able to zoom out.

Reviews.Title: Possibly the worst camera I've ever used
Reviews.Author: Corey Janson
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to snap off some photos when I moved to Vancouver for school (I left my other camera on the other side of the country) and it's one of the worst mistakes I've ever made.When it's not taking blown out white pictures or pitch black images, it's snapping off blurry or orange tinted images.I brought my first one back for another one- the same problem!(And before anyone says that I just don't know how to use it, keep in mind that I've been a photographer for a few years.)Add to that the countless number of reviews for this camera for the same problems that I'm having and you get one bottom line- THIS CAMERA IS A DUD!I'll never buy another Sony camera again in my life. In fact, as the go-to-guy for my friends when buying tech gear, I've told them to stay away from Sony cameras from introductory to professional.I'm sticking with my Nikon from now on. This is possibly the worst camera I've ever used (and that says a lot)

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Natalie
Reviews.Content: This is the best digital camera I have ever owned. It comes in different colors, it's easy to use and understand, and so much more. For what you're buying these days, 200 dollars isn't so bad for a camera like this. The clarity is AMAZING, and I will never regret buying it.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Davvalco
Reviews.Content: This is my first digital camera, and I have to say that is great, easy to use, compatible with my PSP and w810 phone memory, took a lot of pics on 5 MP quality and they look really good, and it's cheap compared with other digital cameras and its Sony.  The price dropped like $100 since I saw it like a year ago.

Reviews.Title: Shocked it was made by Sony
Reviews.Author: T. Glover
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this camera because I had dropped my last one by accident. Yes the price was fair and it was a Sony so I said why not. I went on vacation and every picture that I took came out blurry and I thought when I would develop them it was going to be ok . Wll it wasn't I was shocked that the slightest move or wind would make my pictures come out so horrible. The camera is very sensitive so I say be wary of this purchase but I know that I will not purchase another sony camera ever . Ohg by the way I returned it as soon as I got back from vacation.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased and Highly Recommended
Reviews.Author: Mark A. Holly
Reviews.Content: I have never owned (or even used) a digital camera until I puchased the DSCW55.  I am very pleased with the ease of use and reasonable price.  I purchased the camera solely because of its high Consumer Report rating.  I do advise that one read the user manual first to become familiar with all the settings.  I especially like the rechargeable battery and charger.  I also purchased at 2GB memory stick pro duo which holds hundreds of pictures.  Very pleased.  Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: some goods lots of bads
Reviews.Author: BHBE
Reviews.Content: My husband and I had decided to get this camera because we needed something smaller compared to our old digital that can actually hold a floppy disk. This camera is compact and fits right into your pocket. I like that the dial on the back is very user friendly, when you move it to a new setting the description pops up on the screen. However I do not like the shutter delay, it's awful. It sets off like 3 flashes which blinds whoever you are takeing a picture of and they blink. Which is horrible for babies and kids. The red eye reduction was on and still red eyes were in several pictures. Also I just recently went to a Nickelback concert and this camera let me down horribly. I wasn't that far from the stage but still needed to zoom in all the way and no matter what setting I tried my pictures were blurry and very grainy. Out of about 80 pics probably 6 were good and thats because the performers were standing really still. I cannot tell you how many times I missed my kids perfect smiles because of the delay. I just ordered a canon and I hope that it doesn't let me down.

Reviews.Title: v. happy
Reviews.Author: A. Borman
Reviews.Content: I am v. happy with my purchase - it came just days after I ordered it.  It's easy to figure out and the pictures are amazing!  Only thing is you have to buy the special memory cards for Sony... just one extra step that I'm willing to take though.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: C. Murga "Bronco Fan"
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, it takes very nice pictures, user friendly and it doen't look like my husband's silver camera!

Reviews.Title: Lens gets stuck
Reviews.Author: Christopher W. Tham "Chris Tham"
Reviews.Content: My wife and I love this camera however the first one we got and the replacement both have the same issue of the lens getting stuck when you turn it on.  This seems to happen about 20% of the time.  The only way to make it work is to push the lens corner so that it comes unstuck.  Then it is fine until the next time it gets stuck.Everything else about the camera is great.  Fast pics, easy to use, good quality, lightweight, etc.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: person "person"
Reviews.Content: it is a good camera overall, but the wheel changes to easily and you end up taking pictures on the wrong mode. also the mdoes are somewhat confusing but overall it is great.

Reviews.Title: Cybershot W55
Reviews.Author: ad283m "ad283m"
Reviews.Content: The camera is great, takes fantastic pictures with or without light.I went to the licing room and turned off the lights, the image of the picture was great, as if I hadn't turnedd off the lights at all.Also, It looks great really elegant.

Reviews.Title: camera and case are good. Card reader nan.
Reviews.Author: M. J. Haney
Reviews.Content: Camera and case are good. Card reader nan.I found no issue with software, cable, case nor camera. Works great. The card reader is a joke. I highly recommend getting a memory card right way. The camera is so slim and handy I  use it way more that I thought. Love the video function too. I get praise on the pictures and the cute color.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: N. Nor
Reviews.Content: despite its size that is kinda big and bulky(well for me yes..because i used to own an ultra small pentax optio), but this camera has a little to no weight at all! It snaps a very bright, clear pictures even in a dim room. I bought this for a gift and it's a perfect one..pinky, smart looking etc...

Reviews.Title: nobrainercamera
Reviews.Author: j-man
Reviews.Content: I had used an Olypus digital that I paid about $900 for. Granted in the past 4-5 years cameras on all sides have gotten easier and better but this little Sony that fits in your shirtpocket is ten times the camera as the Olympus. I send lots of email photos and this one will hold a weeks vacation without any backup. The adjustments for red eye, closeups, are all very good.

Reviews.Title: Pretty in Pink
Reviews.Author: A. QUINONES
Reviews.Content: It is a nice camera.  Takes nice pictures as well as video. I would recommend purchasing this item.

Reviews.Title: not that great
Reviews.Author: carla
Reviews.Content: bulkier than it looks, and it feels like a toy. not very solid at all, and the pics aren't that amazing either.

Reviews.Title: Love it...Gotta have it!
Reviews.Author: M. Midgette
Reviews.Content: This is the best digi I've ever owned. It takes wonderful pics, is compact, and it comes in girlie pink...I carry it everywhere to have many memories remembered. It uploads pics quick online and to iphoto on my Mac. I love it!

Reviews.Title: V. Cuuuuuuuuute Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Reem AlBassam
Reviews.Content: i Loved it sooo much & its so easy to use.. Great price.Nice availables colors.. i took the blue one.. it should b called baby blue; )Nothing much to say but its highly recommended.. : )

Reviews.Title: Piece of Junk
Reviews.Author: A. Seitz
Reviews.Content: To say I despise this camera is an understatement. What a waste of money. Sometimes it takes great pictures. Key word - sometimes. Most of the time, however, the pictures are dark & fuzzy. I don't mean blurry - FUZZY, as if it just can't focus. The lens is clean, I've turned on every light possible, and I try taking a picture on every setting, hoping to find one that's somewhat better. It's maddening. After a YEAR of this, and hardly having any decent pictures of my baby's first year of life, enough is enough. This thing is going in the trash, and I won't be buying a Sony as a replacement.

Reviews.Title: Rate of Sony Digital Camera MP 7.2
Reviews.Author: Merchades M. Rutechura "Method"
Reviews.Content: THANK YOU FOR THE PRODUCT YOU SOLD TO ME.IT IS REALLY WONDERFUL AND I ENJOY IT.

Reviews.Title: Good product...Slow shipping
Reviews.Author: S. Delgado
Reviews.Content: Good product...Slow shipping because I paid a fast one and i got like in standard shipping

Reviews.Title: sony cyber shot
Reviews.Author: Judith Persisng "Judy Persing"
Reviews.Content: This Sony cybershot was a Christmas gift and she was very happy with it.  It takes beautiful photos...sharp and the clarity is wonderful.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, great gift.
Reviews.Author: Shawn Lee "Shawn Lee"
Reviews.Content: It's a great camera and it's pink. I bought one for my girlfriend and was a hero at Christmas. And for the deal on Amazon...nuff said!

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Dana E. Tenaglia
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my 10 year old daughter.  It is easy for her to use and she loves it!!!

Reviews.Title: Made in China
Reviews.Author: jesprit2
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and very handy plus a real value for money. Big dissappointment when i saw that it is made in China. I checked the same model around the local stores here and found out that it is all made in japan. Right there I wished I did not purchase online specially when it comes to electronic. I don't know why they shipped this one to me and not the one that is made in Japan.

Reviews.Title: WOW, what a great little camera!
Reviews.Author: Rachael Johnson "Rachel J. Amato"
Reviews.Content: Sony continues to amaze us consumers with products beyond our expectations. Great little camera, I recommend it anyone that takes pictures. Rachel,Davie Fl.

Reviews.Title: sony cypershot camera 7 megapixels
Reviews.Author: D. Gueldner "proud parent"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my daugters birthday.  It is adorable, metalic blue and I also bought the metalic pink(they are twins).  The camera is so easy to use they were making quite lengty vidoes on it in minutes. The view screen is huge, the quality of the pictures is incredible. There camera is better than mine, which I paid twice as much for.  I would highly recommend this camera to someone who wants purse size convience and really beautiful pictures.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera!
Reviews.Author: E. Bacarella "EP shopper"
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this camera.  It is easy to use and the price is great!

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: Jeanne Burch "ashbury555"
Reviews.Content: This is an upgrade to our first Sony Digital Camera.  It is lightweight, easy to use and takes incredible photographs.

Reviews.Title: The cyber shot camera is great
Reviews.Author: Shamaine Elledge
Reviews.Content: The cyber shot digital camera by Sony is a great camera. The camera can take so many amazing out standing photos that has been great to show family and friends. This camera is great for anyone who loves taking photos or who just wants to remember their memories.The settings on this camera are hard to figure out at first but as you play with camera more it becomes easier and a lot more fun to have. There are many settings for the seasons, weather, time of day, and whether you are indoors or outdoors. When changing these settings the camera may adjust to the correct scenery but if wrong settings are set to the wrong scenery than the camera may not adjust as well. Also with the settings is the zoom. The zoom is great because it can zoom in very close and zoom out very far. It is very affective and great. Even when there is a picture saved and you need it to be zoomed in closer you can zoom in on that image and make it show even better.When saving pictures its easy with just a press of a button. The camera may be a small little device but it stores a lot of pictures and videos. It also has a small memory stick that holds a lot of pictures and videos so there is twice the storage.This camera is not only tiny but is very lightweight. It can be stored in your purse back pocket, shirt pocket, and other places too. It comes in three different colors silver, black and even pink.This camera is just a great way to remember life when looking at the crisp clear pictures. I use this camera all the time and have never regretted purchasing it. It is just amazing that an item so small can achieve so much and make people happier with their pictures especially with showing their family and friends. I truly believe this camera is one of the best digital cameras out today.

Reviews.Title: Great deal.........................
Reviews.Author: bigsweetpotato
Reviews.Content: I'd brought this camera for my 14 yrs old son birthday, he loved it.This camera is easy to use & have a lot of functions. I think this is a must have camera.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera!
Reviews.Author: A. Orlando "License"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my wife for her birthday. She loves this camera! Good times for me!

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot 7.2 Black
Reviews.Author: highly educated latina
Reviews.Content: This is my first digital camera and I am glad I bought a SONY. I have bought various SONY products in the past and have never regretted it. The camera takes great pictures, there are different modes when taking pictures and make a difference in the pictures when you "snap the shot". As long as you sit down and read the manual when you receive the product, you will have no problem with using the camera. In terms of the zooming, I wish it could zoom a bit more but with the 3x zoom, the camera is still good. It is compact and fashionable. I highly recommend the Sony Cybershot DSCW55 7.2MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Pamela Cox
Reviews.Content: thany you so mush I love my camera and thank you for your swift shipping I got and took pic,of grandchild and it is wonderful

Reviews.Title: very good products and services
Reviews.Author: Lihua Cox "well"
Reviews.Content: product is good, and shipping is fast, we like both product and seller, we will use this seller again.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Melanie Mays
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. The colors show up so vibrant! It is so easy to transfer pictures and video from the camera to the computer, or from the card(bought separate) to the computer. It's super light-weight and super easy to use.

Reviews.Title: just what i wanted
Reviews.Author: T. Dijos
Reviews.Content: this camera is not only sleek and sexy, but it is the perfect camera for anyone. i especially like how huge the screen is.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera.
Reviews.Author: K. Price "KP"
Reviews.Content: I have a large Sony digital camera which I really like but I was looking for a small version that I could stick in my pocket.  This is a great little camera.  Really enjoy taking pictures with it.  Not sure how much I will want to use my larger Sony now that I have this one.

Reviews.Title: Lens got stuck had to return
Reviews.Author: J. Marie S.
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera and loved the look of it, the feel of it, the photos, the size . . . all until, within 2 weeks of buying it and without anything at all happening to the camera to provoke this problem, the lens stopped opening.  I would turn on the camera, it would start up but the lens cover would not open.  I would turn it off and turn it on again and it would sometimes open the second time and sometimes not.  I loved the camera so much I thought I'd give it a day to "sort itself out," but it just got worse.  So, I'm sending it back and going to try to find a suitable replacement for what the camera was before it broke.

Reviews.Title: good for taking pics, bad for recording video
Reviews.Author: A. Diri
Reviews.Content: With this camera, I think, you can take good quality pics but there is something wrong about recording video. Because, when you watch videos recorded by W55, you hear a very annoying sound like a machine is working inside the camera..I returned my camera to Amazon two days after I received..

Reviews.Title: HORRIBLE durability!
Reviews.Author: Steven B. Keith
Reviews.Content: I got this thing and barely ever used it.. took OK pictures but I dropped it ONCE in the grass while i was camping and the shutter wouldnt open, the flash bulb blew out and I couldnt open or close the shutter!  I sent it back and they wouldnt fix anything because I had tried to manually close the shutter to see if it would reset it self or something?  But no.. they wanted me to pay something like $140 on a camera that I got for $150.. I always trusted Sony but now im going with another company.  What a piece of junk!  Get it if you know you will never ever drip it.. not even on soft grass.  Good luck, losers.

Reviews.Title: Was not impressed!!
Reviews.Author: Jenn
Reviews.Content: My parents bought my little sister a digital camera for her birthday. I borrowed it and was so impressed with the pictures it took, I immediately wanted one of my own. Ignoring my gut feelings, I bought this camera instead of the one that she had - an Olympus Stylus FE-230. I was immediately disappointed by the pictures it took. They all seemed grainy and BLURRY. No matter how hard I tried, or how much I tinkered with the settings, 80% of the pictures were horribly blurry. I had to work hard to brace my arms and hands to get a decent picture. I took it back the very next day and got the Olympus Stylus FE-230, which I am extremely happy with. If you think you're going to have any trouble keeping your hands still, I would NOT recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great but some things not too great
Reviews.Author: Mridul Lidder
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera becuase it was a great camera and not too expensive. I'm happy with it for the most part. great pictures and video. Not too many effects on it though and i still havnt figured out how to make the pictures  black and white. It's not a really simple camera...but besides all of that, the thing i didn't like about it is that you can't zoom while videotaping. Why in the world would you make a camera that dosn't zoom?? i can't figure it out. but whatever. it's a cool camera! :)

Reviews.Title: Sony DSC-W55 Camera is junk
Reviews.Author: Texas Dad
Reviews.Content: This is my second camera of this model.  I loved the first one I bought last year, but dropped it on the kitchen counter about 12 inches and the lens stopped working.  I was quoted $150 to repair it, and instead opted to buy the same model again because it took great photos and thinking the first camera was a lemon.  Six months into owning the 2nd camera, the lens quit ejecting. In addition to cheap plastic parts on the sides, this will be my last Sony camera.

Reviews.Title: Returning this camera for refund
Reviews.Author: Karl E. Kammer "gizmod"
Reviews.Content: This camera took worse pictures than my old 3.1 MP camera, every picture came out grainy looking, poor focus control. Very disappointed with Sony on this camera.  I am going to get a refund on this camera and try something else.

Reviews.Title: Amazon did not deliver it on time
Reviews.Author: EMGgirl
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera - too bad I had to call all around the area to find it and drive out of my way to get it due to Amazon's incompetence.If you need something in a hurry, do not rely on Amazon to get it to you overnight, even having paid $35 for delivery.

Reviews.Title: Nice machine!
Reviews.Author: F. Bayram
Reviews.Content: I used Sony cameras before. I would say this one is really nice. I'm happy with the picture quality. Easy to use and nice looking as well... I would recommend it to anyone...

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Shirley Smalls-smith "Lady Chica"
Reviews.Content: The camera takes great pictures, it very easy to use I love it.

Reviews.Title: junk
Reviews.Author: J. A. titterington
Reviews.Content: This might have been a nice camera had it worked. It was broken right out of the box. It is highly unlikely I will never use your web site again if this is the product I can expect. Your site was supposed to save me time and has only been more of a headache than it was worth.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera but don't pay more then 140
Reviews.Author: chirag
Reviews.Content: It is a good camera, but you can buy this from Amazon itself for 139$ (if you choose a non-pink color), or from elsewhere for 150$ for pink.If you can afford upgrade to W80.

Reviews.Title: Great while it lasted..
Reviews.Author: J. Reed
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera in May and it worked great at first, other than the videos being a little fuzzy, and not taking very good low-light pictures. But around the end of June the shutter started not opening and closing correctly, and the battery power didn't last. Now it isn't working at all. It won't even turn on with a charged battery. Dissapointing.

Reviews.Title: Awesome machine!
Reviews.Author: Erman Kaya "crasher"
Reviews.Content: it is such a perfect stuff! It looks real cute. I am so pleased having it.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershots
Reviews.Author: M. M. Gillan "Book-Worm"
Reviews.Content: There are better & new models avaialble, but these are over $300. If you do not want to spent more money, it is the best model.  Easy to use & good results.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Student
Reviews.Content: Love this camera.  Good quality.  Very light weight.  Consumer reports is right.  Best value.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershop 7.2 MP digital camera
Reviews.Author: A. N. Herring
Reviews.Content: Very cut-looking camera, but not for a novice!!!!  Had to get my great niece to show me how to use  it properly.  Instructions are a joke!!!  Worthless, as far as I am concerned.

Reviews.Title: Camera Review
Reviews.Author: EJM "EJM"
Reviews.Content: The camera is very good - easy to use etc. and was delivered in good condition.  We are very pleased with it, but have not used it very much so far,  Have not used the battery yet, but I assume it works.

Reviews.Title: Great features and light weight, great photos!
Reviews.Author: Campmaster Tom "There's no place like 127.0.0.1"
Reviews.Content: This phone seems to be made of good quality material, very nice style. It's light weight, easy to carry. Has very good battery. The LCD screen is has a good image display, the picture quality is very good and movie quality is also very good. Very pleased and would recommend, great price vs. performance!

Reviews.Title: IT is ok
Reviews.Author: Lina Dyu "hurryup2lina"
Reviews.Content: On the picture the camera looks great. but i do not like plastic cover i prefer metal one. I expected more from this camera than it actually does perform.

Reviews.Title: Started out ok
Reviews.Author: A. Tartakoff
Reviews.Content: At first i was happy with this camera, perhaps lulled by it's good looks and  small size, then I woke up and realized that half of my pictures were out of focus, even when i allowed for the beep supposedly telling me it is focused, achieved by holding the button half way momentarily before taking the picture. Now it seems there is a glitch in the menus. the other day i watched as it scrolled through all the menu settings as if I were turning the menu knob atop the camera. I wasn't.I don't think it's worth my time to send it in for repair. I'll just save for a cannon, I've read good things.

Reviews.Title: BEWARE!! DEFECTIVE AND PLASTIC!
Reviews.Author: P.Mendoza "Camera addick"
Reviews.Content: First of all, I would just like to say that the camera feels cheap.. the buttons are made of cheap breakable plastic. BAD SONY.. (SAYS A LOT ON THE STATUS OF THE COMPANY) which you have to take extra care for.. I bought the W55 pink with case for my girlfriend for our anniversary. I was really expecting a lot from the camera. but just after 2 ... I REPEAT 2 HOURS of total use.. the camera's LCD STARTED SHOWING LINES ON THE SCREEN.. I mean what the... it was never dropped or broken whatsover. I gave the gift late at night so she wasnt able to use it that much. The next morning, she turns on the camera and there.. lines started showing up whenever you take photos.. Amazon I would like a refund or a replacement for this pls.. DONT BUY THIS CAMERA BEWARE.. SONY IM VERY DISSAPOINTED..

Reviews.Title: High Maintenance Camera!!!
Reviews.Author: Amy C.
Reviews.Content: This camera is terrible!!  It eats through batteries like you wouldn't believe and the red eye doesn't work at all!! (And yes, it's turned on!)  9 out of 10 photos need to be corrected!  Total waste of money!  My cheaper digital camera takes better pictures than this one!

Reviews.Title: Wife loves it!
Reviews.Author: Angela K. Allen
Reviews.Content: This product is great for women who are technologically handicapped.  It has little pop-ups for each setting which tells what the setting does and when to use it.  Camera use is very easy as well.  My wife loves the color, too, which all the women are jealous of (I guess grey or silver clashes and isn't an eye-catcher).  Great product, and I highly recommend it.  I would have given it a five if it was cheaper or came with a memory card.

Reviews.Title: Bad
Reviews.Author: Rose M. Chopitea "chopi"
Reviews.Content: my daughter in law bought this camara, the pictures are bad, the noise is like another rewier said is so loud you can hear it. I told her to stick to Nikon or Canon but you know....... she did not pay attention.The camera is very pretty I grant you that but it sucks.

Reviews.Title: Very Problematic
Reviews.Author: Steven Orth
Reviews.Content: So I got my sister Annie, this camera for her birthday. She was really excited, when she opened it up. I go into the kitchen to make flapjacks and sausages. Then all of a sudden, I hear Annie and my wife Linda screaming. I smell smoke. I rushed back into the living room and my sister Annie is on fire. Apparently, she tried to take a picture of my wife and her brand new Sony Cyber-shot bursted into flames, catching the sleeve of my sister's cotton blouse, leaving her with second degree burns. Also, you can't hear the sound on the video playback.

Reviews.Title: ITs OKay...
Reviews.Author: A. J. ANGUIANO-FRANCO
Reviews.Content: First of all the pictures do not have a high quality. I don't really care since I am just having fun with it. But what really bothers me is that the videos are super blurry. It takes a long time to focus and that's difficult to work with when you are trying to record.I wish I would have choose a better camera.

Reviews.Title: The camera is just bait, the delivery is hell...
Reviews.Author: Angel
Reviews.Content: I purchased the case and the SONY 7.2 MegaPyxel camara... yes it sounded good, free shipping, over nigh delivery, You are the customer and we are here to help... what they don't tell you, once they have the money my overnight delivery was change from PROMISE DELIVERY on the 18 of December to the 21st of FEBRUARY 2008.  Now I check with the availability of the products... they have it IN STOCK. yet they can delivered the item overnighth (today is the 26 of DECEMBER) and after I complained at the delay delivery they are going to send it to me at their cost, OVER NIGHT DELIVERY  on the 21st OF FEBRUARY 2008.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: KING LUN WONG
Reviews.Content: it is a brand new product when i'm received. functionare good and i like it.

Reviews.Title: Never recieved the camera.
Reviews.Author: B. Holland
Reviews.Content: It's been over a month now. Where the heck is my camera? Purchased on 8/27 and it is now 9/27. I've decided to take serious action. DO NOT PURCHASE FROM THIS SELLER!

Reviews.Title: Easy Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: CARLOS G. TORRES LOPEZ "El Profe"
Reviews.Content: a camera very versatile and easy to use with many additional tools that maximize their operation

ProductInfo.Features:
7.2-megapixel CCD captures enough detail for photo-quality 14 x 19-inch prints
2.5-inch LCD display; 3x optical zoom
High-sensitivity shooting mode increases ISO to maximum of 1000
Capture MPEG VX video with audio
Stores images on Memory Stick DUO or MS Pro DUO memory cards (56 MB internal memory included)
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Cybershot DSCW55 7.2MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom (Pink)
